name: Cows In Space (Zahhibb)
description:
Invite a friend to help you disarm the planet destroying bomb!

How to play

This game is best played with 2 people where one person handles the defusing of the bomb while the other reads the manual and explains the instructions. It's also preferably that the 2nd person doesn't see the game screen for maximum laughs and ridiculousness that will ensue!

The instruction manual can be found inside the same folder as the executable.

Details

Game was made during a local class GameJam of UX & Game design students, that one of my classmates at school held. The theme for the Jam was You're fired and Anti-UX that we could choose from.

Game Theme we chose: Anti-UX
Team: 3 people
My role: Game designer, Programmer
Duration: 5 days
Engine: Unity

The game is heavily inspired by Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes.
